description: Salih Mustafa faces charges of torture and murder during the war in the Balkans in the late 1990s.
title: Kosovo War: Salih Mustafa's case is the first for Hague court
title_page: Kosovo War: Salih Mustafa's case is the first for Hague court - BBC News
maintext: Speaking at the hearing on Monday, Mr Mustafa, who was part of the ethnic Albanian guerrilla movement, the Kosovo Liberation Army (KLA), said he wished to consult with his lawyer before deciding how to respond to the charges against him.
